content: this knitted tank top pattern works up to a super easy cute and oh so wearable knitted tank top perfect for beginners and still perfect for pros as well pattern includes a link to a full video tutorial and includes us women s sizes xs-xxl everything is in us english terms materials i used berroco meraki #3 light/dk weight yarn needles size = us 5/3 75 mm 14″ circular needles for the neckline and armhole ribbings and 32 circular needles for the body with the same needle size yarn needle 2 stitch marker scissors skill easy notes the pattern is written in english us terminology the pattern is made as us women s sizes xs s m l xl xxl in this picture i have demonstrated with size small for the upper back and upper front we re going to work back and forth in the row then we re going to join in the round and work on the body gauge blocked 19 st x 26 row = 4 yarn needed 410 450 510 560 620 670 yards measurements after blocked xs = 35 78 body circumference x 19 69 length s = 37 47 body circumference x 20 length m = 40 42 body circumference x 21 23 length l = 42 52 body circumference x 21 84 length xl = 45 47 body circumference x 23 07 length xxl = 47 57 body circumference x 23 69 length thank you for stopping by happy knitting
